title: Amenities include Infinity Pool, Spa, Jacuzzi, World Class Fitness°°°
posting_body: ['WE HAVE A RENT TO OWN PROGRAM EASY TO  QUALIFY!', 'Quick move in.', 'If you are an independent worker have low credit or background issues and have problems finding a place to settle with your family, do not hesitate call me or TEXT me, I am a rental expert in South Florida, I will find a property for you and get you approved.', 'WE HAVE A RENT TO OWN PROGRAM with credit score of over 550, we will buy any property CASH for you  up tp $600,000 and then rent it to you for 1 to 3 years until you can get ready to purchase it, it will save some of your rent money towards the purchase ( about 25% of payment).', 'Excellent location!', 'Flexible lease 6 Months Minimum !', 'Fully furnished 2/2 unit with balcony and beautiful bay view.', 'Convenient washer inside and laundry room on every floor.', 'Downtown and Bay Views !!!', 'Walking distance to Lincoln Road and minutes from the beaches.', 'CALL ME OR TEXT ME', 'I RESPOND INMIDIATELLY!!', 'show contact info', ')', '""EASY SOLUTIONS REALTY LLC ""']
